short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search and verification of digital content declarations.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Liccium Chrome browser plugin allows users to verify declarations of digital media content and perform a reverse-lookup of associated metadata, rights, and available or already acquired licences.

Important release notes: 
- This is an early version of the Liccium browser extension, please reach out if you come across any issues or have any questions;
- The plugin is currently working only with images.   
- PLEASE NOTE that only content can be verified that has been that has been publicly declared, before. 
- If you want to make verifiable content declaration, you can test https://Liccium.app. Feel free to sign up at https://Liccium.com.
